Commercial Space on Goodman Road in Olive Branch with Great Visibility at a Great Price.

A beautiful 2590 square foot Commercial space for lease in a high traffic, well-sought after location.

Located at 4850 Goodman Road, Suite #???, above Jason’s Deli in "The Shops of WindStone" Shopping Center, on the corner of Goodman Rd & Pleasant Hill.

The suite is located on the 2nd floor. You and your customers will have access by using the beautiful marble stair case or take the quick and easy elevator.

At the top of the stair way, there are two beautifully appointed large restrooms. The only other tenet on the 2nd floor is Jane’s Gym and they have their own restrooms, so these beautiful restrooms are practically all yours.

The best part: You do not have to pay for the common area of the stairway, elevator or the restrooms. Just the square footage of the property.

The property is being sub-leased for 2 1/2 years at the great rate of $2,400, which includes rent and all triple net charges (taxes, insurance and common area maintenance).

This location would be great for a Chiropractor, Physical Therapy, boutique shop, hair salon, etc.

If you are interested in opening a commercial business on Goodman Road in Olive Branch, MS, please call (901) 310-5632
